channel.title: Trading? [delta]
channel.description: Pretty simple, i just want to make it so when you click on the pink message "player wishes to trade with you" it opens up the trade screen. Right now it only opens up the screen if you right click on the player that traded you and you trade them.

item.title: Trading? [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

Pretty simple, i just want to make it so when you click on the pink message “player wishes to trade with you” it opens up the trade screen. Right now it only opens up the screen if you right click on the player that traded you and you trade them.

Read full topic
